donor_name: Enhanced Integrated Framework for Trade  related  Technical Assistance  to LDC's Trust Fund manager
outputs.output_descr: This project will provide support to review and update the tourism policy and regulations in order to improve the legal and policy environment for the performance and growth of the tourism industry. It will also provide capacity building to key officials in the ministries of local government and tourism in the implementation of the regulations, as well as provide sensitization and information to stakeholders in order to facilitate their understanding of the new regulations.
